election_record.label: Massachusetts 1820 Electoral College

sub_unit.name: Clarksburg
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Clarksburg.

sub_unit.name: Egremont
sub_unit.note: The votes from Egremont were not included in the Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Florida
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Florida.

sub_unit.name: New Ashford
sub_unit.note: The votes from New Ashford were rejected as "return not good."

sub_unit.name: Pittsfield
sub_unit.note: Benjamin W. Crowninshield received 37 votes as Benjamin Crowninshield.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Washington.

sub_unit.name: Attleborough
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Attleborough.

sub_unit.name: Wellington
sub_unit.note: Benjamin W. Crowninshield received 22 votes as Benjamin Crowninshield.

sub_unit.name: Chilmark
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Chilmark.

sub_unit.name: Newbury
sub_unit.note: The votes in Newbury were not certified by the Town Clerk.

sub_unit.name: Dorchester
sub_unit.note: The Independent Chronicle and Boston Patriot (Boston, MA) reports 115 votes for William Gray, 51 for William Phillips, and 64 for Levi Lincoln.
